H0.text: What is the Christian service or ceremony, named from Greek meaning grateful, commemorating the Last Supper. Eucharistia

H1.text: What is the Christian service or ceremony, named from Greek meaning grateful, commemorating the Last Supper. Charisma

H2.text: What is the Christian service or ceremony, named from Greek meaning grateful, commemorating the Last Supper. Thanksgiving

H3.text: What is the Christian service or ceremony, named from Greek meaning grateful, commemorating the Last Supper. Housel

A4.text: The Eucharist is derived from the Greek term εὐχαριστία (eucharistía), which is the root of the word 'Eucharistia'.

A5.text: The Greek term εὐχαριστία (eucharistía) translates to 'thanksgiving', which aligns with the concept of gratitude central to the Eucharist.

A6.text: Sacrament of the Eucharist – Catechism of the Catholic Church
